title: Ranked rewards??
body:
So if I get gold in solo queue I get a skin + border + the respect of all man kind. 
But what if I get gold in solo queue and flex queue? 
What if I get gold in solo queue and flex queue and 3v3s flex queue?

replies.body: As far as I know right now, you should be getting those rewards (and respect) by placing Gold in any ranked queue. Regardless of if you get to Gold in 3v3 or 5v5, you should still be getting the rewards when they go out!
But do the rewards get better if I'm gold in multiple queues?

I don't believe so. On that note, I don't think the 2017 Season rewards have been announced quite yet, so be sure to check the [**rewards page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/tag/rewards) for updates.
At the start of the season they did mention that there would be an extra reward for achieving gold in both flex and solo/duo queues, although it wasn't specified what.

I did just now find that article! If you place in either queue, you'll be getting the Victorious Skin. If you manage to place in **both queues** you will in fact be getting an [**extra reward**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season). 

Alas.....those rewards still aren't announced quite yet xD!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0Eve5Jgr,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-29T01:31:59.190+0000)
>
> I did just now find that article! If you place in either queue, you'll be getting the Victorious Skin. If you manage to place in **both queues** you will in fact be getting an [**extra reward**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season). 
> 
> Alas.....those rewards still aren't announced quite yet xD!

oi, but there's three ranked queues! is there anything at all for placing in Treeline Flex?

A happy feeling in your heart!
